text: The Sindhi Meghwars or Menghwar (Sindhi: سنڌي ميگهواڙ) are a sub-group of the Meghwal people of Indian subcontinent, who live in the Sindh, Punjab, and Balochistan provinces of Pakistan. They are one of major Hindu community in the region. == References == Category:Ethnic groups in India
title: Sindhi Meghwar
